name: Can I Park
description: Can I Park is an app aimed to help drivers in Stockholm to by-pass incomprehensivble parking signs and give the driver a simple answer whether it's allowed to park or not.
techDescription: The Frontend is written in React Native, optimized for iOS. The  map functionality comes from Mapbox and the relevant data is using Stockholm Stads open Parking API. The backend is a simple Express server using Axios to fetch data from Parking API and forwarding it to the frontend.

name: Happy Thoughts
description: Happy Thoughts is a simple messaging mapp resembling Twitter. It was an assignment as part of my Technigo Bootcamp.
techDescription: The Frontend is written in React, HTML and CSS. The backend is an Express server connected to a MongoDB database. The app is hosted at Heroku (backend), Mongo Cloud (backend) and Netlify (frontend).
